OptionDescription: published coordinates whose high quality was confirmed after direct contact with colleague(s) who excavated the sites; or were easily identifiable on Google Earth (e.g. Giza Khufu Pyramid)
published coordinates whose quality was not confirmed by colleague(s) who excavated the site

sites whose coordinates were estimated to be within a range of +/- 1000 m; this was also the case of sites with unknown coordinates, but whose location was shown on published map that we manually georeferenced
sites whose exact position is unknown and reported coordinates often correspond to the location of the closest inhabited centre.
